body_html:
Hmm, that's strange.
How about running

C:\msys64\usr\bin\bash.exe -l -c "patch -p1 -d C:/users/user/_bazel_user/4opxzgxi/external/png_archive -i C:/users/user/tensorflow/third_party/png_fix_rpi.patch"

under cmd.exe?

body:
Hmm, that's strange.
How about running
```
C:\msys64\usr\bin\bash.exe -l -c "patch -p1 -d C:/users/user/_bazel_user/4opxzgxi/external/png_archive -i C:/users/user/tensorflow/third_party/png_fix_rpi.patch"
```
under cmd.exe?
